[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_poly_coeffs()] [Quadratic blowup] Can large ID sets cause quadratic or exponential computation time in mult_tree construction, enabling computational DoS? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_all_eval_proofs_with_setup()] [Proof computation DoS] Can requesting proofs for all IDs in a large set cause timeouts or excessive CPU usage, blocking other operations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: poly_coeffs()] [Clone amplification] Can repeated calls to poly_coeffs() that clone the entire coefficient vector cause memory exhaustion? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_eval_proof_with_setup()] [Setup validity] Does the function validate that DigestKey setup parameters are cryptographically sound before using them? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_all_eval_proofs_with_setup()] [fk_domain validation] Can a maliciously constructed fk_domain in DigestKey produce proofs that appear valid but fail verification? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_eval_proof_with_setup()] [tau_powers bounds] Does the function check that round is within valid bounds for tau_powers_g1 length before indexing? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Struct: IdSet] [State machine violation] Can IdSet<UncomputedCoeffs> be used where IdSet<ComputedCoeffs> is expected, bypassing type safety? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_poly_coeffs()] [State transition safety] Can compute_poly_coeffs() be called multiple times on the same logical IdSet, creating multiple divergent ComputedCoeffs instances? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: from_slice()] [Panic on capacity] Can from_slice() panic internally if the computed capacity causes allocation failures or overflows? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_eval_proof_with_setup()] [MSM unwrap] Can the unwrap() on MSM result panic for edge cases like point at infinity or invalid scalar combinations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_eval_proof_with_setup()] [Proof binding] Are proofs cryptographically bound to their specific IdSet, or can proofs be replayed across different ID sets? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/ids/mod.rs] [Function: compute_all_eval_proofs_with_setup()] [Batch verification soundness] If batch-generated proofs are used, does batch verification maintain the same security guarantees as individual verification? (High)
